entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
